description: Episode of Series "Why can't they be like we were?". After a period of abrasive conflict Gary's parents have separated. The effect of this is shown on the whole family, but Gary is so deeply affected, that his insecurities produce a stomach ulcer. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
